body_html:
Basically this PR introduces two changes:

  1. use str(Label(...)) to fix problem with //tensorflow... not found when in submodule. This was not invented by me. I just applied the idea from #8606 (which is in master already) to xla.

  2. fix the import path for llvm.

fix the import path for llvm.
body:
Basically this PR introduces two changes:

1) use str(Label(...)) to fix problem with //tensorflow... not found when in submodule. This was not invented by me. I just applied the idea from #8606 (which is in master already) to xla.

2) fix the import path for llvm.
